name: CableAir - School of Flight
about: CableAir - School of Flight, located in Upland, California, is a premier aviation training institution dedicated to providing comprehensive flight training for various general aviation needs. Our fleet includes well-maintained aircraft such as the Cessna 152, 172, 182, and Piper PA28, ensuring students have access to a diverse range of training options. Our FAA-approved certified flight instructors are experienced and committed to helping students achieve their aviation goals, whether it be earning a Private Pilot Certificate, an instrument rating, or a multi-engine rating. The school boasts a lounge-style facility available 24/7, along with friendly office staff and competitive aircraft rates. At CableAir, we are passionate about helping aspiring pilots make their dreams a reality through high-quality training and supportive instruction. Join us to start your flying journey today.
